DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect lanthanum carbonate calcium carbonate progression coronary calcification vascular endothelial dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Lanthanum Versus Calcium Carbonate Vascular Abnormalities Patients With CKD Hyperphosphatemia
DOC.criteria: Hyperphosphatemia ( For patient without calcium carbonate , ≥4.5 mg/dL ) ( For patient calcium carbonate , ≥4.0 mg/dL ) With write informed consent History cardiac surgery With coronary artery stent Polycystic kidney disease Hypothyroidism On treatment lanthanum carbonate History admission within 3 month History ileus Severe liver dysfunction Severe gastrointestinal dysfunction Allergy lanthanum carbonate calcium carbonate Pregnant breastfeed woman Judged ineligible investigator
